metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12100 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the 'multires_load_old_dm'functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. Aspecially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in abuffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of theapplication. An attacker can convince a user to open a .blend file in orderto trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
